participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Warm-hearted and introspective, Oliver enjoys reflecting on his past achievements and sharing stories about his life experiences.
participant_1.background: my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, Sophia loves engaging with people and often shares her excitement for music and healthy living.
participant_2.background: i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i just bought a house recently. i'm an economics major. i eat a raw diet.
